title: School Holiday Notice
content: Please note that school will be closed on January 26th for Republic Day. Classes will resume on January 27th as per regular schedule.

title: Annual Sports Day Registration
content: Registration for Annual Sports Day is now open! Events include track and field, swimming, and team sports. Register your child by February 15th through the parent portal.

title: New Library Hours
content: Starting January 20th, the school library will have extended hours on weekdays. New timing: Monday-Friday 7:30 AM to 6:00 PM, Saturday 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting Schedule
content: Individual parent-teacher meetings are scheduled for January 25-26. Please check your email for specific time slots and teacher assignments.
